exceptions.exn: The reference c was not found in the current environment.
The reference a was not found in the current environment.

original: intros a b c. unfold Rmax. destruct (Rle_dec b c). - destruct (Rle_dec (a + b) (a + c)). -- reflexivity. -- apply Rplus_le_compat_l in r. contradiction. - destruct (Rle_dec (a + b) (a + c)). -- apply Rplus_le_compat_l in r0. contradiction. -- reflexivity.
